title: Nexxus VitaTress Cystine Treatment - 3.3 oz
description: Instantly penetrates the hair, allowing Cystine bonding to reinforce the hair shaft. Amino Acids and Wheat Proteins add strength and elasticity. Lightweight. title: Terax Hair Care Original Crema
description: Terax Original Crema is a completely revolutionary conditioner which makes hair ultra soft by altering the pH level of the hair through imparting natural proteins into the capillary fibers. A slightly alkaline substance, it naturally helps to open the hair cuticle, thereby attaining a high degree of penetration. The answer to split ends, broken roots, or overall dryness, luxury hair treatment will give your hair back the life it once had. Terax Original Crema is so soft, it can be used on nail cuticles as a moisturizer, and helps to eliminate static electricity on hair or skin. Whether you use it every day or every week, damaged hair is a thing of the past.

Proteins fill in ravaged hair to smooth and soothe. Moisture-rich micro-magnets build strength. Energy is restored. Ravaged becomes ravishing. Healthy hair rules.
